about_the_game:
Kindred Fates is an open-world monster-battling RPG, and a love letter to the monster battle genre. Our goal is to evolve the genre, and bring fans what they've been asking for.

Explore a vast open world, teeming with Kinfolk to catch and befriend. Forge your path through a shadowy winding story full of meaningful choices. Build the perfect team, customize their abilities, and control your Kinfolk in real-time combat. Form lasting bonds with your team members to unlock their full potential.

But never forget that death looms around every corner. Consider your actions carefully, or you could lose your teammates forever…

Core Features:

  • Open World: Hinterlock is yours to explore! With the help of your Kinfolk, journey across land, air and sea to discover all the secrets this world has to offer.

  • Action Combat: Kindred Fates features fast-paced real-time combat. You need good aim, quick reactions, and awareness of the environment if you want to survive.


  • Single Player Story: Many of us who grew up with monster-taming games hoped they would mature as we did. Kindred Fates brings thought-provoking storytelling, morally grey decisions, compelling character development, and branching storylines to the genre.

  • Perma-Death: If your Kinfolk falls in combat, they don’t faint – they actually die. When they die, their soul materializes as a small blue flame. If their flame is collected in time, you can revive them. If not, they’re gone forever. You can visit the Memorial to pay your respects.


  • Types as Playstyles: Player skill ultimately determines the victor. Instead of types dealing double- or half-damage to each other, each type has its own playstyle. For example, Air Types are often speedy glass cannons, while Fire Types ignite the battlefield with ranged attacks.

  • Bonds: Form bonds with your Kinfolk to unlock their full potential! Strengthen your bonds by winning battles, training, stargazing, or just talking around the campfire.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9600 CPU @ 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not Required
  • Additional Notes: This is a preliminary list of requirements that will be updated closer to the game's release.
